What are you suggesting?  I try to get the character killed?  If only 
that was possible.

  The sad point is my legitimate archmage could be at that same point 
within 5 scenarios.  You see, I had the archmage up  against level 
2000 and level 3000 slime.  The slime were powerfull to destroy my 
summoned fire elementals with one blow!  It took a good strategy to 
get the fire elementals to kill the slime.

Which brings me to a question I was going to ask:  what is the most 
efficient way to create an army of so called 'gods'?  Use high level 
slime and let them multiply, or use high level treehouses?  Or some 
better idea?

Speaking of 'gods', I finally working definition of when I will be 
happy with a given character: when said character can not run out of 
magic power unless time is frozen.
